title: Undead Dragon Vocalizations
description: A collection of huge lizard-like creature vocalizations, contains 220 sound effects, including battle, pain and neutral vocalizations, ready for use in game scenes, animations and trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/undead-dragon-vocalizations

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/bhysnsnidjon39m/MSE%20-%20Undead%20Dragon%20Vocalizations_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The Undead Dragon is a huge lizard-like creature that has known death, but has returned to the world of the living by using black magic. He’s slow, but exceptionally strong. His mighty, eerie roar is terrifying, instilling fear and making even the bravest warriors petrify.


The collection contains 13 voice actions, including 220 professionally designed vocalization one-shot sound effects, divided into:

  • 24 voice sounds during an attack
  • 12 battle shouts
  • 8 breathing sounds
  • 28 deaths
  • 12 groans
  • 24 growls
  • 8 idle sounds
  • 8 laughs
  • 24 pains
  • 32 roars
  • 12 snarling sounds
  • 16 snorting and grunting sounds
  • 12 victory shouts


Such a variety of vocal samples can satisfy a wide variety of needs. 


This package is ideal for creating large and huge monster and boss voices: dinosaur, dragon, sea monster, reptile, lizard, titan, giant, guardian, elemental, infernal and undead creatures and more. 


Using this asset, create an atmosphere for your project in the genre of fantasy, dark fantasy, post-apocalyptic, sci-fi, horror or any other where monsters live and roar.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 220 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 13 voice actions
  • 116 voice samples of the attacking type
  • 64 voice samples of the pain type
  • 40 neutral type voice samples
  • great for game scenes, animations and trailers


Number of Audio Waves: 220

Number of Audio Cues: 220

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 12 minutes 15 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
